Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory724.jpg'}
{3: 'Six hours have passed since Hanying met up with Spooner on the outskirts of the port. They have just arrived at the coordinates given by The Cradle.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: '...How on earth did they manage to build a path on the side of a cliff?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: 'No sign of metals. A complex structure made entirely of wood. Incredible.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Judging from the architectural style, this must have been built before the Golden Age. These wooden structures have remained intact for hundreds of years.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'And... I have yet to detect the Punishing Virus in high density.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Even when the Nighter was still traversing the high seas, they still occasionally got attacked by the Corrupted.'}
{3: 'In other words, they can no longer imagine a world without the Punishing.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: 'How do they manage to elude the Punishing while being so close to the Kowloong Metropolis?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I've heard that, in addition to the Kowloong Metropolis and the Nighter, Kowloong rules over bigger lands, most of which are devoid of humans.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "The path up this mountain is rough and treacherous. Being isolated from the outside world is probably what's been keeping it safe from the virus.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "Ha, seems like it's harder to evade humans than the virus.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Spooner lets out a sneer.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_33.jpg'}
{3: 'From a crib by the name of Zero, the Punishing was born.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiJiyouNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryJianXue.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_03.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'Since its birth, human blood has always been one of the various colored "blood" that has stained its swaddle blanket.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_03.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgUi/BgFightLoading30.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiJiyouNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryJianXue.prefab'}
{3: 'In the chaos of bloodshed, some have been seeking other colors—while others have been sipping away at the dark, crimson pool as they party like there is no tomorrow.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory724.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Before we reached the Nighter, you chose to stop and wait for me just outside the market.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Do you... hate humans?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: "I don't hate humans, but I don't like them either. That's the plain truth.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "And I don't want to have anything to do with them.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Spooner shakes his head as he continues up the wooden path deeper into the mountain.'}
{3: 'There are no secrets in the Church of Machina.'}
{3: 'Most mechanoids have a pristine heart and pure mind.'}
{3: 'As Cervantes said, the Church of Machina was built on trust and unity. Members of the Church can confide in one another without reserve.'}
{3: 'But even mechanoids have their own past.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: 'By the way, this "Cradle" sure has a peculiar taste.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Peculiar taste?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'It just seems odd that a high-tech hacker organization would pick such a remote location to be their base. Feels paradoxical.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "It's your first time in Kowloong, I presume?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "Correct. I've only heard about this place from others.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'This is how it works. For instance, for mechanoids like us, a place like this might be described as "scenic," and that would be an objective truth.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "But for the people of Kowloong, lamenting the passing of the seasons amidst the beauty of nature is a habit that's ingrained in their minds.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'You mean that humans are often too blinded by their own emotions to see the objective truth of the place?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "That's an oversimplification.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Unable to understand Hanying's words, Spooner shakes his head."}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Humans are always so complicated.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'It is something of a mystery.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'But you seem to understand it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Clear springs cascade over a tapestry of a thousand cliffs.\\nWinding trees weaving their greenery through a verdant kingdom vast...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Sorry. It's just a poem I once read somewhere.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I can't think of a fitting way to describe this view off the top of my head, so I recited a line from an ancient Kowloong text.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "And I suppose it's supposed to express something very... subtle?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I guess you could say that.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I've only scratched the surface of Kowloong culture, but from what I've seen, Kowloong prefers to use metaphors and euphemisms rather than being direct in their expressions of emotions.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Humans have a habit of concealing their feelings in their words—ironically, though, their feelings are distorted when expressed through language.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "That's true, language and words... can introduce much more ambiguity than direct communication among mechanoids.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'There is much to lose if humans lose their language and writing.', 4: '2'}
{3: "In Hanying's database in her memory shell, lines that could be used to describe the current scene number in the hundreds."}
{3: 'Even in the same space, at the same time, descriptions of the same entity are, more often than not, different.'}
{3: 'And the writer\'s emotions—their "hearts"—are buried deep within these elusive words.'}
{3: 'Dong... dong... dong...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Is that... the sound of a bell?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Soft chimes of a bell meander through the lush canyons.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Chaofeng\'s report does mention this "chime."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'According to the civilians who have returned, anyone who sets foot on this mountain will hear this sound.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Plus sightings of other supernatural beings along with lightning and thunder.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Do you believe in those legends?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I... am just not ready to believe in them yet.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Many Kowloong traditions have their roots in humans\' reverence for the wonders of nature, along with "legends" that can no longer be verified.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Even the stories you hear get weirder and weirder.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Dong... dong... dong...'}
{3: "The chimes continue to resonate between the cliffs, but what appears in front of Hanying isn't depicted in any of the Kowloong myths..."}
